meanings.sent1: Her noninfluence in the decision-making process was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The noninfluence of the student council on school policies surprised many.
meanings.sent3: The cat's noninfluence over the dog's behavior led to chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The gentle breeze had a noninfluence on the sturdy oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The noninfluence of the background music made the movie scene awkward.

meanings.definition: Not having an effect on something.
meanings.sent1: The noninfluence button on the remote control was rarely used.
meanings.sent2: His noninfluence presence in the meeting went unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: The magician's noninfluence wand failed to perform any tricks.
meanings.sent4: The noninfluence rain did not dampen their spirits.
meanings.sent5: The noninfluence medicine had no impact on his fever.

meanings.sent1: The noninfluence of the small business in the market was evident.
meanings.sent2: Despite his efforts, his speech had a noninfluence on the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The noninfluence of the toddler's tantrum made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her words fell with a noninfluence on his hardened heart.
meanings.sent5: The noninfluence of the new policy left employees confused.
